alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 10:26PM MST until November 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected, locally heavy. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches. * WHERE...Fort Collins. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org. Roads will be slick resulting in slow and hazardous travel. Allow extra time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
